title: Unable To Post On Team Recruitment
body:
Hey, I can't post on the Team Recruitment board as I'm being incorrectly identified as below Level 6 on my account. I'm Level 30 and ranked. I've submitted a support ticket but have not gotten a response in more than three days. Is there something I can do to fix this on my own? Thanks in advance for any help. 

EDIT: Looks like it's fixed. Thanks to Riot BowlO'Ramen! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Sometimes a boards profile and account need to sync, especially if it's posting for the first time.  Usually posting in an areas without level restrictions can resolve this; though, I'm glad Riot BowlO'Ramen was able to help out.  I'll be sure to relay the thanks to him! :D
